text: This is a list of rivers in Uruguay. Tributaries are indented under each larger stream's name. All rivers in Uruguay drain to the Atlantic Ocean. * Río de la Plata ** Uruguay River *** San Salvador River *** Río Negro **** Arroyo Grande **** Yí River ***** Porongos River ***** Chamangá River **** Tacuarembó River ***** Caraguatá River *** Queguay Grande River **** Queguay Chico River *** Daymán River *** Arapey Grande River **** Arapey Chico River *** Cuareim River ** San Juan River ** Rosario River ** Santa Lucía River *** San José River **** Santa Lucía Chico * Lagoa Mirim ** San Luis River ** Arroyo de la India Muerta ** Cebollatí River *** Olimar Grande River **** Olimar Chico River ** Tacuarí Tiver ** Yaguarón River ==References== *Rand McNally, The New International Atlas, 1993. * GEOnet Names Server Uruguay * Uruguay
title: List of rivers of Uruguay
